Delegate tests

Open the console, and verify that interacting with the elements logs output as expected by their descriptions.

Basic binding

  • I can be clicked unlimited times
  • I can be clicked unlimited times
  • I don't have a <a> so am unclickable
  • I can be clicked 5 times

Multiple events

Bind two events, one to "li a" and one to "li.foo a", give one element the foo class, but not the other.

  • Bound to li, triggers 1 event
  • Bound to li.foo, triggers both events
